entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of drizzle late this evening and ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
